Changes Report

Release History

Version Date Description
0.6.2-alpha 06-15-2010 Second Alpha Release. Usability, User Management and Persistence.
0.6.1-alpha 02-23-2010 Initial Alpha Release. Complete infrastructure plus initial feature set.


Release 0.6.2-alpha - 06-15-2010

Type Changes By
Complete database persistence infrastructure for all user data. mruiz
Option to selectively display fields using global 'Show All' option and individual fields' 'hidden' properties. mruiz
Drag and drop rearrangement of fields to organize views. mruiz
Automatic adjustment of rows' background colors appropriately to their position within a view (needed to reset appropriately due to new hiding and moving fields features). mruiz
Option to create/delete custom 'separators' to organize fields in a view. mruiz
Views management infrastructure (UI control and refresh, front/back end communications, data structures). mruiz
Functionality to create, save and update views. mruiz
Functionality to delete views. mruiz
Users management infrastructure (sessions, workspaces, authentication, etc). mruiz
Users' login/logout functionality. mruiz

Release 0.6.1-alpha - 02-23-2010

Type Changes By
Complete abstract infrastructure plus a limited feature set. Check features page for details. mruiz
